title: Self-Driving RC Car
summary: An AI project that aims to allow an RC Car to drive its self and stops when it sees certain traffic signs and objects that blocks the road.

accomplishments.statement: Wrote a web app that streams a live-feed and displays a controller using Node.js, JavaScript, and Python a Raspberry Pi through hotspot and web socketing.
Researched and cleaned a set of datasets in a cloud-server to be used to train the machine learning model.
Built the structure of the intelligent agent.

title: Image Classification (Academic)
summary: An ML project that aims to practice image classification using MLP to compare performance to CNN performance.

accomplishments.statement: Wrote an MLP Multiple Layer Neural Networks using Python.
Trained the Neural Networks using CIFAR-10 dataset.
Documented and reported the Neural Networks’ accuracy using LATEX.

title: Aces Up Game (Academic)
summary: A web game based on the game Aces Up.

accomplishments.statement: Wrote a web app using Java (Ninja framework) for back-end and JavaScript for front-end.
Hosted the web app on Heroku using GitHub.
Our Team Won the Best Web Application for Software Engineering I (CS-361).

title: Ace College
summary: A web app aims to improve college student’s performance by keeping track of important tasks.

accomplishments.statement: Built a web application using PHP and JavaScript.
Used Relational dataset to store data using SQL (MariaDB).
Worked with a fellow teammate and documented our work using GitHub's wikipage and LaTeX.

title: Personal Website
summary: A website where I share my current status, thoughts, and projects.

accomplishments.statement: Wrote a personal website using NodeJS for back-end and JavaScript for front-end.
Hosted my website on virtual machine (DigitalOcean).
Wrote a NGINX script that directs HTTP requests to HTTPS and maps networks.

title: A.I. for a 2D Grid Game (Academic)
summary: A simple AI that solves a grid game using the inverse logic of Minesweepers, which performes better than an average human.

accomplishments.statement: Wrote a 2D grid game (Hunt the Wumpus) using C++.
Wrote an intelligent agent in C++ that solves the puzzle inspired by Minesweepers.
Acquired code organization skills by modularizing my programs and defining appropriate classes.
